definition[0]: some, but not all, of a particular thing
example[0]: Part of the money will be spent on a new playground.
example[1]: Part of the castle was destroyed by fire.
example[2]: For part of the day, you will be outside doing practical work.
example[3]: Part of me hates him  (=I partly hate him).
example[4]: Poor working conditions are only part of the problem.
